name: No Thanksgiving
description:
This game was made for the WeeklyGameJam82 and the TVGameJam

Theme: TV show that you would turn into a video game scene

I chose south park as my show and i used the wild turkeys for the game

Happy Thanksgiving!!

Your town has been overrun by wild turkeys!!

We urge all citizens to help remove the turkeys 
from the area

Left and Right Arrows to move
Up Arrow to jump
Space to shoot
